snippet: Darius McCollum, who has been arrested more than two dozen times for taking subway trains and buses for joy rides, took a Greyhound bus in Midtown Manhattan, the police said.
abstract: New York City police arrest Darius McCollum for stealing Greyhound bus from Port Authority Bus Terminal; McCollum, has been arrested over two dozen times for similar thefts, has Asperger's syndrome, and police say he stated that he intends to try to steal plane next.
lead_paragraph: Darius McCollum, who has been arrested more than two dozen times for taking subway trains and buses for joy rides, took a Greyhound bus in Midtown Manhattan, the police said.

headline.main: Repeat Train Thief Steals Bus at Port Authority, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Repeat Subway Thief Steals a Bus, Police Say
